data.approach: Add kill and pause actions to all session states that are missing them. Currently: completed (no kill/pause), polishing (no pause), auto-proceeding (no pause), compacting (no pause), starting (no pause), paused (no kill), idle (has cleanup but no kill/pause), ready (no kill/pause). The fix is adding these as low-priority actions at the bottom of each states action list.
